author: gkbrown
msg: - Update Stock Watcher demo; add periodic refresh and user input functionality.
- Fix minor validation error in ListView and TableView.
- Use long values for timeouts in setInterval() and setTimeout() instead of int.
- Fix minor repaint bug in LinkButtonSkin.

author: gkbrown
msg: - Add MIME type support to pivot.serialization.Serializer interface.
- Minor clean up in web server test servlet.
- Ensure that mouseOut() is called when a component is disabled and currently contains the mouse.

author: gkbrown
msg: Update clean targets in Ant scripts to remove JAR files as well as bin directories
